name: kitn-diagnose-tool
description: Diagnoses kitn project issues â€” validates config, checks installed components, detects broken imports and missing files
docs: Inspects a kitn project by reading kitn.json, kitn.lock, and installed component files. Reports: missing files, incorrect imports, stale lock entries, missing dependencies, and common configuration issues. Designed to be used by the kitn-doctor-agent or called directly.
